Header: Funds allocated to provide tabs for Advanced level teachers
Content: Minister AkilaVirajKariyawasam has said that financial grants required for the provision of tabs to Advanced Level students as well as teachers have been allocated. The Minister made this reference at a function held at the WellawatteSaiva MangaiyarVithyalayam. The Annual Prize Giving of the WellawatteSaiva MangaiyarVithyalayam was held under the patronage of Minister AkilaVirajKariyawasam. Prizes and certificates were presented to students who displayed this skills in subjects as well are extra-curricular activities. School Principal ArundaniRajavijayam was among those present on the occasion. Expressing his views the Education Minister said that changes are now being effected to the curriculum. In the near future instead of nine subjects, the number will be reduced to six. He said that training is now being imparted to teachers and principals of Government Schools. Based on an idea mooted by Prime Minister RanilWickremasinghe, a Cabinet memorandum has already been approved for the granting of tabs to all students in the Advanced Level classes. He disclosed that grants necessary for the purchase of 200,000 tabs to be provided for Advanced Level students and teachers within a few months.
